message: I'm excited to offer you this unique and valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Thank you for offering such a unique product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. It's a fair price considering the product's unique features and value.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $11000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this unique product.
I respect your decision, Alice. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $14000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $13000 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the deadline. I'm willing to meet you at $13500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. This is my last offer, Bob.
I appreciate your last offer, Alice. Considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had, I am willing to pay $13000 for the product.
